aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Learn about our mission, history, and the dedicated team behind HeartfeltHome.

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: A journey of compassion and dedication since 2010.
history.paragraph1: HeartfeltHome was founded in 2010 by a group of passionate individuals who recognized the urgent need for quality care for orphaned and vulnerable children in our community.
history.paragraph2: What began as a small initiative with just five children has grown into a comprehensive care program that has supported over 500 children through our residential and community programs.
history.paragraph3: Over the years, we have expanded our services to include educational support, healthcare, psychological counseling, and life skills training to ensure every child receives the care they need to thrive.
